mapper.select: select * from reserve where salon_no is not null
select count(*) from reserve where To_TIMESTAMP(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') between RESERVE_IN and RESERVE_OUT and room_no is null and reserve_cancel = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into reserve values( 'sa-'||to_char(SALO_SEQ.nextval), To_TIMESTAMP(#{reserve_in}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF'), To_TIMESTAMP(#{reserve_out}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF'), (select salon_price from salon where salon_no = #{salon_no}), sysdate, 'N', #{salon_no}, null, #{dog_no}, #{mem_id} )

insert into reserve values( 'ro-'||to_char(HOTE_SEQ.nextval), To_TIMESTAMP(#{reserve_in}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF'), To_TIMESTAMP(#{reserve_out}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF'), #{reserve_price}, sysdate, 'N', null, #{room_no}, #{dog_no}, #{mem_id} )
mapper.select: select a.*, b.*, c.* from reserve a, dog b, room c where a.dog_no = b.dog_no and a.room_no = c.room_no and a.mem_id = #{mem_id} and a.reserve_cancel = 'N' and a.salon_no is null and a.reserve_out < sysdate

select a.*, b.*, c.* from reserve a, dog b, room c where a.dog_no = b.dog_no and a.room_no = c.room_no and a.mem_id = #{mem_id} and a.reserve_cancel = 'N' and a.salon_no is null and a.reserve_out >= sysdate
